channel.title: A Bowl of Noatmeal
channel.description: Greetings! I'm Noatmeal and this is my blog. My goal is to mostly write about computer science, programming, and mathematics, but life has a way of being distracting and so I'm bound to write about other things here and there.

item.title: Getting Started With Lean
item.description: Why I started learning the lean programming language and what my hello world program looks like.

item.title: The Near Future
item.description: A discussion of past ambitions I've had and what I'm going to do about it.
